plot: Follows the Many Misadventures of scatterbrained Ryan Carmichael, Along with his quick witted roommate Ruby West. As they Live, Laugh, and Love together in New York City.
plot_en: Follows the Many Misadventures of scatterbrained Ryan Carmichael, Along with his quick witted roommate Ruby West. As they Live, Laugh, and Love together in New York City.

title: Ryan & Ruby
